name: Your Love
description:
You've just moved into the neighbourhood, and you're looking for somebody. Talk to the people in town to figure out where they went!

This is my first ever game (if you can call it that) and it's made in bitsy! I mostly wanted to try out the program but thought I might aswell share it. Consider it a late valentine's.

Controls are WASD to move, walk up to/onto an object or sprite to interact.

I hope you like it ^^
